body_html:
To clarify, specifying ports on the node names passed to fillNode* and readNode* in TensorFlowInferenceInterface should still work.

The crash here was likely happening in TensorFlowImageClassifier where it tries to get the size of the output node prior to inference:
final Operation operation = c.inferenceInterface.graph().operation(outputName);
body:
To clarify, specifying ports on the node names passed to fillNode* and readNode* in TensorFlowInferenceInterface should still work.

The crash here was likely happening in TensorFlowImageClassifier where it tries to get the size of the output node prior to inference:
`final Operation operation = c.inferenceInterface.graph().operation(outputName);`
